about_the_game:
Esferibot: A mystery in outer space

Uncover the Enigma of Esferibot's Stranded Station




Picture yourself awakening on a sprawling space station, but something is dreadfully amiss.
The station's once-familiar corridors and chambers have devolved into a labyrinthine enigma, teeming with enigmatic contraptions and perplexing anomalies. Your mission? Navigate this treacherous terrain, harnessing your wits and resourcefulness to unlock the secrets buried within.



Embark on an exhilarating journey in my upcoming game, an immersive 2.5D platformer that will ignite your senses with its captivating blend of mind-bending puzzles and heart-pounding action.
As you step into the metallic shoes of Esferibot, prepare to be thrust into a broken space station where every step you take unravels a web of mystery.

Key features

  • Create your own Esferibot:
    In the customization menu, choose your favorite colors to apply to Esferibot. Discover and unlock new hidden colors and skins for even more spectacular options.

  • Control a Variety of Vehicles:
    Take control of a range of vehicles, each with its own capabilities, to aid your navigation through the most inaccessible areas of the station.

  • Transform Esferibot into a sphere to race faster and jump higher, or switch to robot mode to interact with elements such as moving boxes and activating systems.

  • Engaging Action and Mind-Bending Puzzles:
    Test your speed and coordination abilities through the dangers of the station and sharpen your problem-solving skills as you encounter an array of mind-bending puzzles that demand creativity and resourcefulness.

  • Unravel the Station's Enigma:
    Delve into a gripping narrative where every step you take brings you closer to unraveling the enigma of the space station.

Join me on this extraordinary adventure with Esferibot: A mystery in outer space. Be part of the journey to unravel the enigma of the stranded station.
